A submission is considered filed once it is accepted by the Administrative Remedy Clerk. Thus, the term filed includes all submissions with the status codes of ACC, CLD, CLG, or CLO; i.e., all accepted or closed submissions. Rejected or voided submissions are not considered "filed".
